review: This item has allowed us to wirelessly play or show anything from one of our devices on our flat screens.  It is a cool device and works very well.  I would recommend this item to anyone.

review: This works perfectly from our phones, Android & iPhones as well as our laptops.  I just wish it work from my Kindle Fire.  After trying to watch Amazon movies through my Kindle with no luck, we found we could stream through our Blue ray player.  Even so, this is a fun, convenient gadget to have.

review: In the first 2 minutes of trying to use it, I lost the connection at least 4 times, the computer I am trying to link is just a few feet away.  Its really not going well at all.  I like the idea but the whole "streaming" function is very clunky and I feel like this day in age, we should not have to deal with choppy crappy video.  I have the best internet download speed available and I have an apple tv which works great.  I'll return this later today, its worthless.

review: I use the chrome cast to stream video from my unraid server to my TV using Plex Media Server software. Very slick. No problems. Unbelievable performance. Setup my buddy with Plex media server software on Windows 8 machine and chrome cast on TV. He uses an android tablet and casts movies using Plex software on the tablet. Again amazing quality and value for money. Would highly recommend.
